attributes.action: Change the regulations so that persons living solely on the income from private pension schemes can receive class 1 national insurance contributions, therefore enabling them to qualify for maximum retirement pension, without the need to register as job seeker, especially when the prospects of employment due to age are significantly reduced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is ludicrous to require people who are near retirement age, but not at that age, to sign on as job seekers, when the prospects of employment are negligible, and because of income from private pension schemes, no benefits are paid, purely to receive the benefits of the national insurance stamp.
